name: PixelFem #79 - Niki de Saint Phalle
description:
Niki de Saint Phalle was a French artist best known for her sculptural female figures known as Nanas. Colorful, patterned, and crafted in a variety of shapes and sizes, these sculpted women embody de Saint Phalle’s feminist spirit. Niki de Saint Phalle was committed to campaigning against racial segregation, social injustices, AIDS and, above all, women’s lack of rights. Later in her career, Saint Phalle discovered “a deeper, more feminine world.” As a result, her art became an ode to femininity, both in sensual and empowering ways; criticising conservative and traditional feminine values.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
